title: Interstellar War
description: A homeland in ashes. A merciless ancient enemy. A vicious new foe. A galaxy convulsing with war.  With humanity on the brink of annihilation, only one option remains, Interstellar War. Can Jon Pike achieve victory, and revenge, for himself and humanity?  Find out in Interstellar War, Book 5 of The Pike Chronicles.
author: G.P. Hudson
